duties_responsibilities.duty: Greet and register guests, provide outstanding guest service, and settle guest accounts.
Make and modify reservations, handle hotel operator and concierge duties.
Maintain high standards of personal appearance and grooming.
Comply with hotel policies, standards, and regulations for safe and efficient operations.
Handle requests for information, mail, and messages in an efficient and courteous manner.
Answer guest inquiries about hotel services, facilities, and hours of operation.
Handle check-ins and check-outs in a friendly, efficient, and courteous manner.
Maintain knowledge of property amenities, local area attractions, and special events.
Participate in creating an enjoyable work environment.

education_certification.credential: High School diploma or equivalent required; College coursework in a related field helpful.
